A major milestone has been achieved - Mytholmroyd's new flood defences are ready for winter to better protect 400 homes & businesses.

Thank you to the local community for their patience during the construction of this important & complex ¬£41m scheme.

https://t.co/RBitmIFTRX https://t.co/ygj1bskYIv
Sunrise over Ely Cathedral @spainshall @SigmaImagingUK @suffolkwildlife @EssexWildlife @EnvAgencyAnglia https://t.co/JB82afcJzJ

tweets.text:
Looks nasty, doesn‚Äôt it! ü§Æ

Something to remember when you‚Äôre clearing up from Christmas dinner üçΩÔ∏èü¶É

Don‚Äôt pour them in the sink üëé

@unblocktober @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK https://t.co/Ob3r89RjyA
Flood defences are due to be installed in Bewdley today. Follow @WorcsTravel and @EnvAgencyMids for updates https://t.co/0NPvvvsMDZ

A helicopter is now on site to help repair the breach and stabilise the bank on the Aire & Calder navigation, as part of a multi agency operation with @CanalRiverTrust, @East_Riding and @HumbersideFire https://t.co/9jFVoGXbmU

urls.title: Eye On Calderdale
urls.description: Your one stop website for up to date information about flooding, weather and traffic disruptions across the Borough of Calderdale.

tweets.text:
Mytholmroyd‚Äôs ¬£41m new flood defences are winter-ready‚Äô. 

Our flood risk adviser Paul Swales says they will better protect over 400 homes & businesses. ‚Å¶@Calderdale‚Å© #PrepareActProtect 

https://t.co/RBitmIoj0p https://t.co/rBzgThAoac

FLOOD PATROL UPDATE 3pm 22/12/2020.

A Flood Alert is still in place for the Lower River Soar in Leicestershire - River levels are Rising üìà

Slash lane, Sileby is now Flooding but Passable with Caution ‚ö†Ô∏è (pic attached)

Other Flood prone roads are Clear ‚úÖ
Use Caution ‚ö†Ô∏è https://t.co/lIWUtoATgL
@TM_WRT @YorkshireWater @EnvAgencyYNE @YorksWildlife @bradfordmdc @YorkDalesRT @CLAtweets Rivers will have more depth to hold more water banks higher again holds more water thus less flooding

Is there a monster lurking beneath your feet? 

When Fats, Oils and Grease mix with other unflushables like wet wipes they can create monster #Fatbergs in our sewers. 

Let Fats Oils & Greases cool off, then reuse or scrape into the bin #BinIt4Beaches #DontFeedaFatberg https://t.co/HR3qrzIACJ

For the first time a stretch of river in the UK has Bathing Water Status!
Impressive activism by @CleanIlkley.
Proving their stretch of the River Wharfe met the rules took a lot of hard work. Kudos.

https://t.co/uxmnqxTPUr

tweets.text:
Did you know Bristol has a history of flooding, including 20 tidal floods in the last decade alone? 
We‚Äôve worked with @envagency to develop new proposals to manage Bristol‚Äôs flood risk in the future. 
Tell us what you think before 20 December (tomorrow!)
https://t.co/XXgKiXx88f

tweets.text: @morss_alex @Feargal_Sharkey @pow_rebecca @EnvAgency @NFUtweets @YorksWildlife @YorkshireWater Agreed Alex, but this was our only option for us to clean our River up relatively quickly. If left to the EA we would be looking at another 15 years of waiting. This starts things moving  now.

If you are at risk of #coastal or #river #flooding, the @EnvAgencyNW Flood Warning Service is designed to provide advance notice of #flood events, allowing time to prepare.

Find out more about flood warnings and how to register here: https://t.co/QlXpJtSrm5

#floodaware #floods https://t.co/8CEMJe2oWi

urls.title: Somerset rivers stocked with fish in run-up to Christmas
urls.description: Thousands of fish have found new homes just in time for Christmas thanks to the Environment Agency‚Äôs annual restocking of Somerset‚Äôs rivers.

tweets.text:
üêüüéÖ Merry Fishmas everyone! More than 9,000 fish have been put into Somerset's rivers to boost stock, including Somerset Frome, Rivers Sheppey and Yeo, plus some ponds.

https://t.co/QCK9pErE1i https://t.co/AakGO2QdQR

We take illegal and potentially harmful fishing incidents extremely seriously. Read our Senior Incidents and Compliance Advisor‚Äôs review of the year, how we responded to challenges and our crackdown on illegal fishing activity.

Read here: https://t.co/rMM219UtQn
@RBWMsupport @berecca83 @EnvAgencySE Maybe @RomneyWeir can suggest who to contact?

Update from @DaveThroupEA in the West Midlands. Please keep checking your #flood risk 
https://t.co/4HSc5MbL20 https://t.co/sz8ndG9qib

‚ö†Ô∏è #Bewdley Bridge will close tonight at 7pm for approx. 4 hours for the installation of @EnvAgencyMids flood defences

@worcscc @WyreForestDC

tweets.text: @berecca83 @EnvAgencySE Unfortunately we have no authority over the waters so we are not able to influence the decision here. If you have not had a response via tweeting them you can also call them at this number - https://t.co/HZwqjXfEpZ

The short section of #Stourport Road #Bewdley between Westbourne Street & Beale's Corner will be closing from 3pm for flood defence installation

@worcscc @WyreForestDC @EnvAgencyMids
The helicopter has arrived and ballast is now being dropped in to the Canal to try and stem the flow from the breach. @CRTYorkshireNE @EnvAgencyYNE @kiergroup @ERfloodrisk https://t.co/NZ7bhmAVg4

Don‚Äôt feed a fatberg this festive season-when hot fat, oil & grease cools it forms a solid mass which can build up inside pipes. Leave them to cool then scrape into the food waste or bin instead. 
 
Blocked pipes can cause flooding & pollute our beautiful beaches & countryside https://t.co/0li5vuFJIb

Works are progressing well on Phase 2 of the #Carlisle Flood Risk Management Scheme

Works on Brunton Park flood walls have begun this week. 

For more information check out the FloodHub  https://t.co/q6vY44XQsg https://t.co/DwkQqUXkpH

tweets.text: How much would you be willing to pay for your #Christmas dinner? If you pour leftover fat down the sink, it might end up costing you more than you think! @unblocktober @EnvAgency @LanesForDrains @YorkshireWater @NorthumbrianH2O @unitedutilities @stwater @thameswater https://t.co/lUZE8SUgJs

River Yare at Thuxton looking horrendous after a bit of rain. Mud coming from fields & building sites - mostly preventable.  Shocking DIY grups straight into the main channel (Highways?) making it much worse @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgencyAnglia @NENorfolkSufflk @YareWildlife https://t.co/4OnuMWJ0lN

In January @thetrentvalley will be digging temporary test pits across the #BurtonWashlands #BurtonUponTrent to help inform biodiversity proposals with @EnvAgencyMids & @eaststaffsbc. Find out more on our website at https://t.co/JJIcU3M5dy https://t.co/JVcRRo1Zyl
